annotations.description: The Last Word is a modern classic and bartenders favorite with roots in prohibition, what's not to love? Today I make a Last Word and spin out a variation on...
annotations.title: The Last Word is a Formula for Cocktails | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Lime Juice
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Maraschino
1 oz. -or- 15 ml. Chartreuse
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Gin

Shake and strain into coupe or nick and nora

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WaZb_BSy4dI

---

.75oz (22.5ml) Gin
.75oz (22.5ml) Green Chartruse
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Maraschino Liqueur

Shake and pour. 
Garnish with a maraschino cherry

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jfmNye2DXeo
title: Last Word
